website_summaries.verdict: The Whale Point weighted hula hoop’s weight makes it a great selection for children and beginners alike, and its versatile segmented design makes it easy to construct larger or smaller hoop sizes as needed.
cons: Although a lighter weighted hula hoop is fine, you may have to work harder to see results

customer_reviews.title: Fun Exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: I love my exercise hula hoop. It is easy to put together. And it is lightweight. I only rated it 4 stars because the foam on the hula hoop moves easily and exposes the plastic part.
customer_reviews.author: luvbeing_toyat

customer_reviews.title: Lighter weight - perfect if that matters to you.
customer_reviews.text: This is lighter, at 2.3 pounds, than most other listed hula hoops. I wanted the lighter one as I am slim and retirement age. It set up easily, takes apart as easily, is gently foam padded, and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Becky O

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in like 2 minutes. Just snap them together. You can alternate colors, do half and half, etc. It's up to you. It works perfectly. I know they said you can make it smaller by using less pieces but I don't think they bend enough for that. Maybe you can take away once piece or something. But it'll bend it beyond it's natural point.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Received USED item!
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine, and its a perfect size! I only used 7 pieces to get mine set up. I’m 5’7”, 137lbs, and Still have one extra piece left! The color is as advertised. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is, BC I received USED item. The material shows that it was used and assembled before. There was some dirty bandage on the side of my box, not the shipped box But it’s actual box inside, and the opening of the box was ripped like someone had opened it previously impatiently! For the dirty microbes/viruses sent to my address, plus the used item I was generous enough to give it 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Fun exercise, AND a good cardio workout
customer_reviews.text: The older I get, the thicker my waist becomes....I read somewhere that exercising using a hula hoop could help combat this issue. So i ordered on. It is a nice weight, and soft enough material not to bruise your waist. And, it is a hoot! The first day I could only do a few minutes--it is a GREAT cardio workout. I am building a few minutes every day. I have used it about a week. Going to measure my waist at the end of a month and hope to see some good results. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: April Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Foam issues!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for less than two weeks, and I haven't really used it very much. Although it looks great, and I like the idea of it, the quality is poor. The foam around the hoop is already falling apart! In several places! I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: maryona

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality. It’s sturdy and it is not too heavy in my opinion. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Super hard to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to lose weight and I'm good at using hula hoops but this thing I could not for the life of me use, I watch videos on how to use it and it just kept falling down after one spin and it actually hurt my legs as it was spinning down hard. I'm sure it could work for someone else I dont know why it wouldn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Clarke

customer_reviews.title: severely overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a regular hoola hoop, but with foam-type padding. I was expecting a heavier product to make exercise more challenging, but it’s just another lightweight hula hoop... There is not much distinguishing about it, except for the ugly hot pink color.
customer_reviews.author: THE CUSTOMER YOU WANT

customer_reviews.title: It’s flimsy and challenging to disassemble
customer_reviews.text: Just received hula hoop and I was very dissatisfied and disappointed. It was flimsy and very hard to disassemble. The instructions show white oval markings on the foam which indicate where the button are but there are no markings on the hula hoop. Thus when you want to disassemble it you have to roll up the foam in search of the button which will eventually rip and/or loosen the foam.
customer_reviews.author: Cegies Conner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and works great!
customer_reviews.text: You can adjust the size by snapping and unsnapping different pieces and it works great. It's heavy enough for good exercise effect but soft enough with form to make it comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LHZ

customer_reviews.title: flimsy hula NOT
customer_reviews.text: I was truly excited to get this and try it out. Once together it was flimsy, and didn't hula. Now I am a really good hula hooper for sure...but this was a disappointment. I know there are other products out there....really not worth the money. Sad.....
customer_reviews.author: TWYLA MORTON

customer_reviews.title: The quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a grownup hoolahoop, I wasn’t even sure what that meant. I was amazed by the quality of this one. The weight is perfect. I’m actually way better at this one than the traditional ones my daughters have. Fast shipping & perfect packaging. I’m ordering my sister one next.
customer_reviews.author: AshBo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Hoop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoop hoping it would be as good as one my friend has. Unfortunately, I found that this hoop is flimsy and rips very easily. I would love to get in contact with the seller for a refund for this product as it is not as advertised. I used my friends hoop again and the difference between the two is great. I unfortunately would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: If you haven't hula hooped in a while ..
customer_reviews.text: Consider this your warning, it's not as easy as you remember from your youth. Assembly was pretty easy. My partner and I initially tried to use this hoop and failed, repeatedly. This thing is heavy, and it seemed like it would require us to defy the laws of physics. After staring at it for about a week, I finally did some research on YouTube. Now I have successfully hula hooped, but I'm still not able to go more than 4 minutes without it falling. If you haven't hooped in a while, you want to make the hoop as big as you can.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I used the hoop several times and the foam coating started splitting. It did not hit anything sharp. It didn't spin smoothly. I returned it and bought another brand that is fantastic. Sorry, I can't recommend this to anyone. The return process was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: Buyers review it before purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice pack and easy to assemble , but very poor quality. Super heavy as well! Very disappointed ! Used for only 3 times. its cracked ! Buyers better read its review before you purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: happyface

customer_reviews.title: Weight is difficult
customer_reviews.text: If you did this as a kid I bet you can do it again, that is if you had a chance with a lightweight hoop. It just requires a step at a time to develop a reasonable amount of time using it. Unless the weight throws off the motion you remember. A weighted hoop is harder, enough that I probably will return this. I just wanted to try something new and fun. Really disappointed I can't simply buy an old fashioned one. Not profitable. The ones I have seen nearby are for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Unable to disassemble
customer_reviews.text: I did not notice the button for disassembling was missing until it was too late. I had completely assembled the hoop and began to test it since it felt awfully flimsy and I wanted to see how it would handle. It was difficult to keep it up around my waist. I wanted to return it and that’s when I discovered there was no button for disassembling as shown in the instructions! Because of that I do not recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Best quality you’ll find for the price point! I’m 5’ and this still works for me and the weight is just right, not too heavy not too light. The pieces snap together so it’s super simple literally took me a min or so to set up, comes with a cute little waist measurement. Don’t be too rough with it and store it in a good place because it does have a soft covering on the hula!
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar item a long time ago and wanted to replace it. This one had good reviews so I trusted them but I am unhappy. This hula hoop is very flexible and feels like it's about to come apart while you're using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Fun
customer_reviews.text: Super smooth and easy to use. The pieces are easy to assemble like a puzzle piece. I am 5'3" tall and medium body built but felt more comfortable utilizing all 8 pieces. Initially I did two interval sessions lasting 10 minutes each with a 5 minute break in between. At first, I did not really feel anything until the next morning! It was a great feeling to be sore and know that I'm getting the work out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good workout
customer_reviews.text: You have to make sure the grooves are aligned and press the side button. Then snap together. I think it’s very good. I used to have a hula hoop years ago. I loaned it to my daughter and never got it back. I’ve been looking for one at TJ Max and Marshals they had the best prices. But I found this one here at Amazon and I’m very happy with my Hula Hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoop for my wife to learn how to hula hoop. Unfortunately she had problems getting the rhythm down so we purchased a larger and lighter hoop from another company. Now that she has developed the fundamental skill of hula hooping, she came back to this hoop and loves it. It is great for getting a workout and she stands in our living room watching TV while hooping.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart immediately
customer_reviews.text: This product feels very cheaply made. It was a pain to put together and once I did (making sure the pieces snapped together properly) it fell apart right away. I ended up buying a different brand that was easier to assemble and worked way better.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Not a smooth round circle as expected
customer_reviews.text: Hurts when you use it because of the bumps. Not a smooth round circle because you have to click each pieces together. Only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not large enough
customer_reviews.text: I have a four pound hoop that has a larger circumference and am able to keep it up. This one, however, I am unable to - smaller circumference. I’ll just spend the extra to get a two pounder from a local hoop maker.
customer_reviews.author: LLA

customer_reviews.title: Not like weighted hoops at the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this came in a box and could travel with me. That's all that I loved about this product. I use a weighted hula hoop at the gym for 20 minutes at a time. Not this one-something is off about it. I decided to return it, but had to call Amazon because I couldn't get it apart. The buttons shown on the outside of the hoop in the picture are really on the inside and difficult to undo. This product was not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: We struggled to find just the right hoop for our 8- and 11-year old grandkids. This fits the bill for us. Sturdy. No “bumps.” Easy to assemble. One is blue; one, pink. We had to return an early hoop (different model) and the company could not have been better to work with. These hoops are just what we were looking for...and most importantly, the kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my niece. When she began putting it together, we realized one of the connections was misshapen and would not stay clicked together. Big birthday flop. saw no option to return for refund
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R. Coggins

customer_reviews.title: Great weighted hula hoop
customer_reviews.text: I love this hoop!! it was so easy to put together. It's pretty. It's easy to swing around my body. What more could I ask for? I wish it were available in more colors and weight options. I was concerned about spending $30 on a hula hoop, but it was well worth it. It feels sturdy and like it will last for awhile with regular use. Recommended purchase if you're looking for a weighted hula hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fast logistics
customer_reviews.text: The hula hoop can be easily adjusteb without getting tired at all. Foam, his elasticity is very good. I turn around and exercise every day. The size is just right. Now I exercise for half an hour after get off work every day. This is also a good exercise for sedentary office workers. Simple and easy to use. The quality of their stuff is still very high and will not smell of inferior plastic foam when delivered. The materials used are still very good. good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Colors are pretty and the tubing is soft
customer_reviews.text: This will be fun as long as I don’t have to take it apart for ANY reason...arthritis and neuropathy in my hands won’t work with this....that’s my drawback. I did try to take one section out while putting it together just to be sure I could and I COULDN’T. And you state if it breaks within 30/ days you will send a brand new one...customers have 30 days to return it anyway...
customer_reviews.author: Hippie435

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using the weighted hula hoop for about a week and I am very happy with it! The first time I used it, I did have a small bruise on my hip and I had to wait a couple of days to use it again because my waist was tender, but I feel like it is a good work out and I will definitely continue using it. I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing hoop
customer_reviews.text: This broke three days after I started using it. Nothing out of the ordinary, normal hooping around my waist and it snapped at one of the joints. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brink

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fun
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find a way to make working out more fun and thought I’d get this exercise hoop that I can easily use while watching tv. It’s fun and great to use. The only downside is that while using it the foam sometimes moves revealing some of the plastic underneath and I constantly have to adjust it. Besides that, it’s a great hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Torres

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun
customer_reviews.text: I was getting bored with my equipment and thought this would be worth a try. I really have fun with it and I feel the burn. I recommend it if you’re tired of your current exercises for your core. It’s a great addition to what I already do. Assembly was easy and the hoop is well padded.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The quality is pretty disappointing. I’ve had it for a week and used may be 2-3 times and already surface is broken in couple of places. Not durable. Unfortunately it will not last. For the price I paid I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Gara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This as such a god buy. You really will see your waist slim down and it feels fun especially if you do it with music it won’t even feel like a workout. My kids saw me do it and now they love joining in too. I also love that it came with a little mini tape measurer so you can measure your inches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Hula Hoop
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a weighted hula hoop before, but after my experience with this one, I can see what all the hype is about. Using a weighted hula hoop for exercise is so much fun! It doesn't even feel like exercise. I have to put a timer on whenever I use it because otherwise I'll do it all day. This is such a great product and I could not recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: madison

customer_reviews.title: Really fun & good exercise
customer_reviews.text: I really love this weighted hula hoop. I didn’t know what it would be like, but it’s like getting a massage while you exercise. It’s really fun too. I’m glad I bought it. I don’t know if I would be able to take it apart for travel? Right now that’s not an issue!
customer_reviews.author: Rae Stang

customer_reviews.title: Terrible assembly system
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to undo once assembled. I can’t get it apart to send back. Useless. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gower

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: Like others I’m having a hard time keeping it from falling. But all the videos say it takes practice. The foam is extra soft. Almost too soft. Ripped in two places on my first day :( I’m going to keep at it though
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wieland

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for me
customer_reviews.text: This was too heavy for me, I think I ordered the 2lb one. It left bruises on me and I couldn’t get used to it no matter how hard I tried. Also felt too thick and felt like it kept bending as I was using it, wouldn’t stay in a complete circle as it was spinning. I’m sure it could work great for the advance, but not for me. As for disassembling it, it was the most challenging thing ever, had to have my husband do it and he struggled quiet a bit. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Molly Avery Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money
customer_reviews.text: The darn thing does stay up at all . And trust me I know how to hula hoop. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Linette Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Inner child fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this hula hoop! I used to hula hoop all the time when I was younger. I can only do about half an hour total so far. I like to do half the time going to one side and the other half to the other side. I want to make sure things are even.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Bruises
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a weighted hula hoop that has those ridges/bumps on the inside. I got awful bruises and hated it. This one doesn't have those bumps and it is a good size and weight. I've been using it for a few months and I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: V.M.

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. Sadly, I couldn't get this to keep going no matter what I did. My teen had no problem, however, she complained of abdominal pain after using. Hoop was sturdy and easy to assemble. Shipping was fast and return was painless.
customer_reviews.author: k.c.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is the perfect weight and size. Was easy to assemble. I’ve only had it for little over a month and used it <10 times in short duration. The outside material started to crack and peel in all areas. At first I found one and I thought I must’ve hit it. But then I found the same formation of cracks all around. Hoping manufacturers can resolve this issue or make right.
customer_reviews.author: L Z

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine fitness find
customer_reviews.text: Been using this hula hoop for 2wks now. It’s not heavy at all, super easy to assemble- my 13yr old daughter put it together with no help lol. Also, comes with a tiny tape measure so you can keep track of your waistline inches as you lose. Great workout with minimal impact.
customer_reviews.author: BritMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I had a hula hoop in the 1950s and have had this one for about a year. This weighted hula hoop is easier to use than lighter hoops. At first, I noticed the little bumpy places under the cushioning, but now it just feels like a nice massage.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Engel

customer_reviews.title: Damages easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough review to write because I love the Neoweek hoola hoop but I am disappointed it damages so easily. I’ve only had it 5 days and used it in my living room, so the hardest surface it could’ve hit was a table when my grandsons tried it. Last night we noticed little cuts as shown in the photos. I do love the weight and how easy it was to use.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get one and revisit your youth!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely fun purchase for exercising at home. I don’t know how much exercise I’m actually getting using it, but I do know it’s fun and stress-relieving! It is easy to use; I hadn’t hula-hooped since childhood, and I was up and running in no time at all. It’s kinda cool that it’s portable, although I have yet to encounter a need to travel with my hula hoop yet...guess my life is just not quite that fun!
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Hoop it up (WOOP WOOP)!!
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME!! But let me tell you - plan to practice a bit!! Oh - and I did experience some soreness and slight bruising around the hip area. But I am sure that will subside as I continue to hoop. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Casper

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The material is already falling off the outside, and the weight makes it sag. I've had it about one month. The colored peices are already seperating... they are about an inch apart in every connection. Meh. It's not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: What I received is not what I ordered and paid for. It weighs 1.4 pounds fully assembled. It’s a “massage” Hoop, not a weighted hoop. The only thing that looks similar is the color. So disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: Sheltie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is weighted so make sure you understand that before you purchase. It is heavier than the ones you can buy from Walmart and much more sturdy. My kids have all played with it and it still is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Daddyx3

customer_reviews.title: Good rainy day or hot, humid day exercise.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a great alternative form of exercise when the weather is not being cooperative for walking. I break up my routine to two sessions at 15 minutes each in the kitchen area watching my favorite shows on tv. It’s easy to store. I just keep it behind the piano against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: End connections loosen at 1st try
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to lose some of my belly fats after more than a yr of giving birth and a few acquaintances mentioned this to be helpful of their tummy goals so here I am. So far, the only concern I have is the connection of each end..they seemed to loosen after I first used it but I tried tightening/securing each lock so now hoping they don't loosen again..we'll see. But so far, it's working good. Am only on my second day so wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 4 times a week for 2 weeks, about 20 minutes at a time. I am on a carpeted surface so no way did I damage it, but already the rubber is cracking. For the price I will use it till it dies but I expected it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The links don’t conect very well . It ripped after 5 mins of using it
customer_reviews.author: Agee

customer_reviews.title: Fun workout 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and so much fun! Hula Hooping doesn't feel like exercise but I started to sweat after 10 mins. I just stand in front of the TV and Hula Hoop for half an hour. LOL. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: White_Rabbit808

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this hula hoop
customer_reviews.text: I just love love love this hula hoop. Not too heavy, very easy to use, soft to touch and plesantly painfull on my waste.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice weighted hoop
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a reasonable price. Easy assembly. Even though it has a foam covering my wife found it a little hard on her hips when she was first trying to get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t disassemble
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this hoola hoop. It assembled fairly easily, but it kept a falling so I tried to disassemble it to make it smaller. I spent over an hour trying to press the buttons and pull. It refuses to release. I don’t even know if I can return it because I can’t disassemble it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, back in the days, I was really good at this. A bunch of seniors decided to try this for a fun afternoon at a winery. So fun and the wine 🍷 was good also. Not serious exercise but fun.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Hard to disassemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another hula hoop to compare. This one is light and comes together easily, but when I tried to disassemble it didn’t want to release. Very hard to find the release button through the foam ( I had to pull back the foam to find the button, then needed a tool to push it in for it to release). Another product that weights 3lb. Is much easier and I believe will be used longer because of the weight. I decided to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Shough

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick workout!
customer_reviews.text: I like the foam cushioning, which does not seem to move around like some reviews said. It took about a minute and a half to assemble but it seems more difficult and time consuming to disassemble so I’ve left it connected.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Etesse, DDS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been looking for, for a long time for my waist line excercise. And it’s really worth it the weight was perfect for me not realy heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Orreyjen_11

customer_reviews.title: It’s useless for me; I’d prefer to return it.
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t adjust to a smaller hoop as described in its ad. It’s much to flimsy and lightweight to function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Maria Balderas P.

customer_reviews.title: don't love it
customer_reviews.text: the foam rips easily and it is quite heavy so make sure you're not crazy like me and use it for 1.5 hours straight and end up bruised and sore on the hips for two weeks. besides that it also lost its shape after only a few uses, it is not a perfect round circle anymore. meh, not worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this hoopla hoop, it is not sturdy enough at all and it doesn't weigh enough....my friend has one that works much better 😏
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Every bad quality but it works!
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday, I love this weight but its quality! I think I can purchase a better quality one in the dollar store! Anyway, it works!
customer_reviews.author: JJC

customer_reviews.title: too heavy
customer_reviews.text: When it is assembled, the hoop is too heavy to make it rotate around the body-no matter how hard you try--no matter how in shape you are!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to exercise
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get a little exercise. Just enough weight to make it more challenging, but not too much that make it hard to be fun. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimtexas

customer_reviews.title: The foam won't hold up for long
customer_reviews.text: I do like the weighted hoola hoops. I find they are easier to use. This hoola hoop the foam that goes around it has been separating from each other so you can see bug spaces between each other. Also the padding has so many tears in it, i was not rough with it, I never hit it on anything but yet there are huge pieces missing from the foam just from regular use
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: fun workout device
customer_reviews.text: assembling was easy, but the separating part was not quite easy, there weren't visible buttons that indicated where to press when detaching the parts. but works well and is sturdy when hoola hooping, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alyazia

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I got a defected product. Wasted my time to return it. End up cost me more money and time. Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: Nam le

customer_reviews.title: So excited to get this!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today. I love the colors! It was so easy to put together. Now if I can only remember how to hoola hoop! 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Cramer

customer_reviews.title: I like it...
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to assemble; works for my workouts perfectly, but it does take a little bit to get used to if you’re used to traditional hula hoops.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa995

customer_reviews.title: ladies need to have it:)
customer_reviews.text: it is just so much fun to dance a little bit.. great purchase, easy to assemble, I have it for few months.. works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: Came apart a few time initially, but after snapping it back together it stayed. Kids and I both like it. Fun easy way to get some exercise in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Left bruises on me!
customer_reviews.text: Hurt after the first round of it going around my waist and I couldn’t do it past 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout
customer_reviews.text: I love my hula hoop. It’s a great workout for your core. It is very sturdy and well-made. It’s the perfect size, not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: quick shipping easy to assemble soft touch
customer_reviews.text: soft touch, easy to assemble, fast shipping, a bit heavier than usual store bought ones so make exercise slightly quicker
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Tai

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful hoop and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Need a bit of strength to snap in pieces. Otherwise I am very happy with this hoop. Looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it bruised my torso so much. Also, it was difficult to take apart without pinching and leaving marks on the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: This hula hoop is comfortable and easy to use. It’s a workout that makes me smile and is fun for contests among family members. Some of the foam padding is separating a little, but doesn’t impact the comfort or usability. If it gets worse, I’ll update my review, but so far I’m pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop!!
customer_reviews.text: I won a hula hoop contest w this. All the girls bought one after they tried it. Not sure if it trims the waist but is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Katie from Ct

customer_reviews.title: Tummy goin dooown lol
customer_reviews.text: Love it especially when l turn my favorite songs on lol can't wait to get the light up one.
customer_reviews.author: coco

customer_reviews.title: the connections broke the first time i tried to put it together
customer_reviews.text: hard to get together and then broke the first time i tried to use it
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what i thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I dont like it... it doesnt do what its suppose to do. Ive extended it then shortened it still a no go. I think its to thick thats probably why it wont spin
customer_reviews.author: Strawberrii

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to assemble and really hard or next to impossible to take apart. Very flimsy. I should have returned it but I waited to long to open it
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: As described I have no problem using this. It is easy to use I am a novice and it was easy to use. Not seeing a change in weight
customer_reviews.author: Shop til I drop

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun way to excercise!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this! I have been looking for ways to add more childlike joyful activities into my life and this has been such a great addition. It mixes up my workouts too!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: I can tell I’m going to be sore tomorrow because every time I saw it, I picked it up and used it! Good product for the money-a nice starter hoop
customer_reviews.author: readinsun

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Love the weighted Hula Hoop. It was easy to assemble and can be easy to disassemble to take with me on trips. Great weight of 2lbs to start with but hope to get to where I need the 5lb one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Wp Ashmore Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Overall it does its job
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and arrived quickly. It also comes with a tape measure key chain which I thought was cool. The only con I had is I feel like the pieces to the hoop don’t lock together as tight as I would like them to. Overall it is a good product and does its job
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Idahosa

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy, but a great workout.
customer_reviews.text: What I disliked was finding out how out of shape I am. It took time for me to build up to 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Stedham

customer_reviews.title: Three small slits in the padding.
customer_reviews.text: I think this hula hoop will work well, however, there were about three small slots in the foam covering. It may work for someone more experienced but, a beginner may drop it often, causing the foam to possibly tear.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

product_meta.title: NEOWEEK Hoola Hoop for Adults,Weighted Hoola Hoop for Exercise-2lb,8 Section Detachable Design-Professional Soft Fitness Hoola Hoop(Pink-Gray)
product_meta.description:
TO ALL CUSTOMERS 

Hoola Hoop is a good exercise to make you slim and health，We hope you can stick with it and enjoy it

Benefits of the Hoola Hoop exercise:

1:Calorie burning as much as possible.

2:Makes balance and coordination on your body.

3:Flexibility increased.

4:Shapes sexy waist line!

5:Lays the foundation for dancing,gym,workout etc.

Highlights of our Hoola Hoop:

1:Not very heavy and is suitable for adult to use

2:The soomth surface won't hurt your waist

3:Easily assembled and disassembled you can carry it anywhere

4:Concise while fashionable apperance looks more personalized compared with traditional hoola hoops in commonly single color

Matters need attention:

1:Do not use hoola hoops within 1 hour before and after meals

2:Do not put a hoola hoop around your neck



Exercise plan:

1:4-6 times a week

2:2-3 groups each time,Each group of 10-20 minutes

3:Rest 10-20 minutes between each two groups

Package Included:

1 X 8 Pieces of Hoola Hoop(the assembled hoola hoop weighs 2.3 pounds and measures 38 inches wide)

1 X Bonus Accessory:Soft ruler
feature_bullets: 1.SMOOTH HOOLA HOOP: Compare to the wave design, the smooth foam padded surface is more comfortable, which can protect beginners from waist injuries.
2.FREE GIFT: Contains a cute soft ruler, you can use it to measure your waistline, and test the effect of exercise
3.EASY TO CARRY: the weighted hoola hoop is detachable and easy to assemble. Great for storage and convenient to take our hoola hoop to the playground, lawn, Party,Coastal Beach and so on
4. FITS FOR: Our hoola hoop Weighs about 2 pounds and measures about 38 inches wide. Recommended our hoola hoop for adults and beginners.
5.GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE: we'll GIVE YOU A NEW HOOLA HOOP FOR FREE should it break within the first 30 days!
